description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Watch the Maze Builder construct a different maze every time. Starting with easy levels for the beginners then progressing to the largest he can get on the screen. On the way you will come across predators that sometimes bite and even kill. Good luck, you'll need it.
